patthana16.54:1.1_0: Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho
patthana16.54:1.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.54:1.1_2: nasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ sappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana16.54:1.1_3: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaṭigho
patthana16.54:1.1_4: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.54:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naappaṭigho
patthana16.54:2.1_1: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.54:2.1_2: naappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ appaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana16.54:2.1_3: paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naappaṭigho ca naanidassanaappaṭigho naappaṭigho ca
patthana16.54:2.1_4: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe…
